name: Short Climb Race Simulation
description:
Climbing encompasses a range of durations and intensities, especially when it comes to racing up those climbs! Today we simulate a race situation with multiple, short climbs. Drawing on all of your hard work in the weeks preceding this. Today is the day to push yourself and show us what you have got!
